name: Download Manager MS
author: bquade

sections.description:
Download manager with:
* multisite support
* download buttons and forms
* easy file uploads
* stats charts
* much more
sections.installation:
1. Upload bq-download.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Unzip bq-download.zip.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Will there be regular upgrades with new features?

Yes.

Are customizations to the plugin available?

Yes, Download Manager MS can be customized to your specifications. Go to http://bqplugins.com
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added nonces to most user functions for added security.
  • Made file directory names unique to each site, for better monitoring of download activity.
  • Added warnings at the top of each admin page if the server is running versions of WordPress, php or MySQL that are not compatible with the plugin.

1.0.1

  • Fixed a problem that prevented some file types from downloading correctly.
  • Added notification on settings page for incompatible php versions.
  • Updated Help and About pages.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Download manager with multisite support. Stats charts, shortcodes for download buttons and forms, easy file uploads, and much more.
